product_name: Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus Adventure Kit Solar Charger
long_description: The Guide 10 Plus Adventure Kit Solar Charger boosts tablet power up to 25% and helps you charge up cell phones, GPS units and rechargeable batteries anywhere you go--just add sunlight!
short_description: The Guide 10 Plus Adventure Kit Solar Charger boosts tablet power up to 25% and helps you charge up cell phones, GPS units and rechargeable batteries anywhere you go--just add sunlight!
